mapper.select: SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, TERMINAL_SEQ_NO AS terminalSeqNo, CHANGE_CHASU AS changeChasu, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, TERMINAL_CORP_CODE AS terminalCorpCode, MODEL_CODE AS modelCode, HIRE_TERMINAL_ENABLE AS hireTerminalEnable, INSTALL_TERMINAL_GUBUN AS installTerminalGubun, TERMINAL_HIRE_FEE AS terminalHireFee, GATEWAY_IP_ADDR AS gatewayIpAddr, TERMINAL_IP_ADDR AS terminalIpAddr, TERMINAL_SMASK_ADDR AS terminalSmaskAddr, WORK_PLAN_DATETIME AS workPlanDatetime, TERMINAL_PROD_NO AS terminalProdNo FROM ATMS_02001130

SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, TERMINAL_SEQ_NO AS terminalSeqNo, CHANGE_CHASU AS changeChasu, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, TERMINAL_CORP_CODE AS terminalCorpCode, MODEL_CODE AS modelCode, HIRE_TERMINAL_ENABLE AS hireTerminalEnable, INSTALL_TERMINAL_GUBUN AS installTerminalGubun, TERMINAL_HIRE_FEE AS terminalHireFee, GATEWAY_IP_ADDR AS gatewayIpAddr, TERMINAL_IP_ADDR AS terminalIpAddr, TERMINAL_SMASK_ADDR AS terminalSmaskAddr, WORK_PLAN_DATETIME AS workPlanDatetime, TERMINAL_PROD_NO AS terminalProdNo FROM ATMS_02001130 WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_02001130 SET JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, TERMINAL_SEQ_NO = #{terminalSeqNo}, CHANGE_CHASU = #{changeChasu}, STEXT_GUBUN = #{stextGubun}, TERMINAL_CORP_CODE = #{terminalCorpCode}, MODEL_CODE = #{modelCode}, HIRE_TERMINAL_ENABLE = #{hireTerminalEnable}, INSTALL_TERMINAL_GUBUN = #{installTerminalGubun}, TERMINAL_HIRE_FEE = #{terminalHireFee}, GATEWAY_IP_ADDR = #{gatewayIpAddr}, TERMINAL_IP_ADDR = #{terminalIpAddr}, TERMINAL_SMASK_ADDR = #{terminalSmaskAddr}, WORK_PLAN_DATETIME = #{workPlanDatetime}, TERMINAL_PROD_NO = #{terminalProdNo} WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}

INSERT INTO ATMS_02001130 ( JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, TERMINAL_NO, WORK_SEQ_NO, TERMINAL_SEQ_NO, CHANGE_CHASU, STEXT_GUBUN, TERMINAL_CORP_CODE, MODEL_CODE, HIRE_TERMINAL_ENABLE, INSTALL_TERMINAL_GUBUN, TERMINAL_HIRE_FEE, GATEWAY_IP_ADDR, TERMINAL_IP_ADDR, TERMINAL_SMASK_ADDR, WORK_PLAN_DATETIME, TERMINAL_PROD_NO ) VALUES ( #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{terminalNo}, #{workSeqNo}, #{terminalSeqNo}, #{changeChasu}, #{stextGubun}, #{terminalCorpCode}, #{modelCode}, #{hireTerminalEnable}, #{installTerminalGubun}, #{terminalHireFee}, #{gatewayIpAddr}, #{terminalIpAddr}, #{terminalSmaskAddr}, #{workPlanDatetime}, #{terminalProdNo} )
